name: One Line (itch) (JCJS games)
description:
*Please understand that there may be a mistranslation using a translator.*

------------One Line------------

The only way to make it fast and make the playtime appear moderately was a 'makes the stage difficult.' You can think of it as 1D. This time, I used a lot of Post Processing effects. If latency occurs, change the graphic to Bad in the settings of the stage menu and it will be solved. The game will also be uploaded to the Google Play Store.

Is this a platformer game? idk

How To :

-Press right arrow key to move right.
-Press left arrow key to move left.

Stage : 15

Next update :
-More stage
-Add skin (not sure)
-Bug improvement

Made without the help of adults.
